DOC.brief_summary: The investigator want test hypothesis addition recruitment manoeuvre low pressure pneumoperitoneum lead additional reduction postoperative pain . Therefore investigator conduct prospective randomize control , single blind trial .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Low Pressure Pneumoperitoneum Pulmonary Recruitment Postoperative Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Two group : 1 . A cholecystectomy low pressure pneumoperitoneum ( 8-10 mmHg ) 2 . A cholecystectomy lowpressure pneumoperitoneum ( 8-10mmhg ) end pulmonary recruitment manoeuvre ( 5 sec max 40 cmH2O ) .
DOC.criteria: ASA I II refusal give consent cholecystitis BMI 35 intolerance one pain medication pregnancy
